Who is the retainer for

  • no graphic designs

Why a retainer is good

Programming and advances in computing is never ending. It seems there is always something that needs implementing, fixing or re-writing. That can make maintaining bespoke software really expensive. Sticking to the monthly retainer package will help constrain your spending and encourage you to prioritize what work really needs to be done.
